Steps.Message: Welcome to the MirageXR editing tutorial! To start, let's create a new activity by tapping the plus button below.
We should add some info about our activity so it's recognisable. To do this, tap the Info tab.
To give our activity a new title, we can tap on the field below.
Activity descriptions help users understand what an activity is about. To add one, we can tap on the field below.
Now we're going to add some steps to our activity. Tap the Steps tab to continue.
Activities consist of steps, which hold content for users to experience. Let's create a new step by tapping the plus button below.
First let's name and describe our step so users know what to expect. Tap the Info tab to continue
Just like with the Activity, we should add a title...
Finally, let's add some content to our Step. To do so, tap the Augmentations tab.
Augmentations represent different AR content for our users. A list of possible augmentations can be seen by tapping the plus button.
Here you can choose any of the available augmentations to add to the step. More information on each augmentation is available on their info page. This concludes the tutorial, have fun exploring!
